Pre-Game Insights: Former boss Rob Page saw his reign end after losing a penalty shootout to Poland in the Euro 2024 playoffs.
Craig Bellamy was appointed as Wales head coach in July, despite having no senior management experience.
Turkey has a talented crop of forwards including Kenan Yildiz and Arda Guler.
Wales will be without several key players due to injuries and suspensions, including Wayne Hennessey, Tom King, Dan James, and Wes Burns.
Turkey will be without injured Brighton & Hove Albion new boy Ferdi Kadioglu, as well as dropped duo Yunus Akgun and Yusuf Yazici.
Vincenzo Montella has most of his first-choice players available, with Hakan Calhanoglu expected to start in midfield.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Ramsey will remain Wales captain.
Karl Darlow and Owen Beck are among the uncapped players called up for Wales.
Bertug Yildirim and Merih Demiral must serve suspensions for Turkey.
Turkey's attack is feared, while Wales have lost some of their roar.
